description: Update contact information (phone, fax, address) across the website and add unit + E2E tests

userStories.title: Update Schema.org Structured Data â€” Phone, Fax, Address
userStories.description: As a search engine crawler, I want accurate phone, fax, and address data in the JSON-LD structured data, so that Google Knowledge Panel and local search results display correct contact information.
acceptanceCriteria: In src/app/layout.tsx, the jsonLd object telephone field is '+18082001840' (old value '+18008888888' does not exist)
In src/app/layout.tsx, a faxNumber property with value '+18086701163' exists after telephone and before email
In src/app/layout.tsx, the PostalAddress streetAddress is '189 Anapalau Street' (old value '189 Anapalua Street' does not exist) and does NOT contain '(Hawaii Kai)'
In src/app/layout.tsx, the PostalAddress addressLocality is 'Honolulu' (old value 'Hawaii Kai' does not exist in PostalAddress)
New unit test added to verification suite
New e2e test added to verification suite
